sentences.sContent: Anna swivelled round to face him.
sentences.sCn: 安娜转过身来面对着他。

sentences.sContent: She swivelled her head round to watch what was happening.
sentences.sCn: 她转过头来察看发生了什么事。

sentences.sContent: Danny swiveled his chair away from me.
sentences.sCn: 丹尼把椅子从我身边转开了。

trans.tranOther: to turn around quickly and face a different direction, or to make something do this
